statements: SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'buy' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND transaction_type = 'sell';
SELECT user_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT transaction_type FROM cryptocurrency_transactions;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, balance FROM users WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, amount, currency FROM transactions WHERE currency = 'USD';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 AND currency = 'USD' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, balance FROM users WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 500
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, currency, timestamp FROM transactions JOIN users ON transactions.user_id = users.user_id WHERE first_name = 'Alice'
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, currency, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT user_id, username, balance FROM users WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT wallet_id, address, balance FROM cryptocurrency_wallets WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY username ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users INNER JOIN cryptocurrency_wallets ON users.user_id = cryptocurrency_wallets.user_id WHERE balance < 500 ORDER BY email DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT wallet_id, address, balance FROM cryptocurrency_wallets WHERE balance > 100 ORDER BY wallet_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, amount, sender_address, receiver_address FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY amount ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT u.username, c.amount, w.address FROM users u INNER JOIN cryptocurrency_transactions c ON u.user_id = c.transaction_id INNER JOIN cryptocurrency_wallets w ON u.user_id = w.user_id WHERE c.amount > 100 ORDER BY u.username ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transaction WHERE amount > 100
SELECT user_id, transaction_type, currency FROM transaction ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, name, email FROM user WHERE balance < 0
SELECT * FROM wallet WHERE currency = 'USD'
SELECT id, from_currency, to_currency, exchange_rate FROM currency_exchange
SELECT * FROM transaction WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT user.name, wallet.balance FROM user JOIN wallet ON user.id = wallet.user_id WHERE wallet.balance > 5000 ORDER BY user.name ASC;

SELECT user.name, transaction.amount, currency_exchange.exchange_rate, (transaction.amount * currency_exchange.exchange_rate) AS converted_amount FROM transaction JOIN user ON transaction.user_id = user.id JOIN currency_exchange ON transaction.currency = currency_exchange.from_currency WHERE transaction.amount > 100 AND currency_exchange.exchange_rate > 1;

SELECT user.name, wallet.balance, currency_exchange.to_currency FROM user LEFT JOIN wallet ON user.id = wallet.user_id LEFT JOIN currency_exchange ON wallet.currency = currency_exchange.from_currency WHERE currency_exchange.exchange_rate < 1 ORDER BY wallet.balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE balance > 1000
SELECT user_id, transaction_type, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT currency_name FROM currencies WHERE currency_id = 1
SELECT user_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM wallets GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_balance > 5000
SELECT * FROM users WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount < 0 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT u.username, w.balance FROM users u JOIN wallets w ON u.id = w.user_id WHERE w.balance > 5000;
SELECT c.currency_name, e.rate FROM currencies c JOIN exchange_rates e ON c.currency_id = e.id WHERE e.rate > 1.5;
